price: Ya ce: "Shin, kan* san abin da kuka aikata ga Yũsufu da ɗan'uwansa a lõkacin da kuke jãhilai?"
arabic: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ
footnotes: * Yũsufu ya bayyana ga 'yan'uwansa, kuma sun yãfe wa jũna laifi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla hal ʿalim'tum mā faʿaltum biyūsufa wa-akhīhi idh antum jāhilūna
